diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Constitutional mismatch-repair deficiency syndrome and stage III adenocarcinoma of the colon.
differential_diagnosis: Infection (e.g. Yersinia enterocolitica, Amebiasis, Tuberculous enteritis)
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with abdominal pain, fever, and weight loss, with imaging showing localized colonic-wall thickening and lymphadenopathy atypical for Crohn's. A colonoscopy revealed an obstructing mass that was diagnosed as an adenocarcinoma, confirmed by biopsy, and associated with findings suggesting constitutional mismatch-repair deficiency.
